enhanced_description: IMI EDU, established in 1981, is India's first corporate-sponsored Business School with campuses in Kolkata (2010) and Bhubaneshwar (2011). It offers a variety of management programs including PGDM, PGDM (HRM), PGDM (B&FS), and a Fellow Programme in Management (FPM), designed to build strong foundations for careers in management practice, consulting, and entrepreneurship. IMI EDU is internationally accredited by AACSB, AMBA, SAQS, and NBA, ensuring high-quality education and global linkages. The institution emphasizes industry engagement and aims to contribute to building a more diverse and inclusive workforce through its offerings and corporate partnerships. Its services extend to corporate training and development, potentially leveraging learning analytics and machine learning for HR.
